duck: Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology, an R&D university in Gwangju City, South Korea

GiST, or Generalized Search Tree, a flexible data structure for building search trees - In computing, GiST or Generalized Search Tree, is a data structure and API that can be used to build a variety of disk-based search trees.
Gist processing, a cognitive process in fuzzy-trace theory
Gist (Computing), a scientific graphics library written in the C programming language
Essence, the central idea or main substance
gist definition: the ground of a legal action.
German Institute of Science and Technology (Singapore), a one-stop higher learning institute in Singapore (also known as TUM Asia, subsidiary of Technische Universität München)
Mount Gist, a mountain 8 nautical miles (15 km) northwest of Mount Strathcona near the head of Denman Glacier
Gastrointestinal stromal tumor, an uncommon neoplasm of the gastrointestinal tract

milestones: Kent Hovind faces a 58-count federal indictment
